scripts.serve: parcel serve application/index-electron.html --out-file index --out-dir electron-bundle/ --public-url ./ --target browser --hmr-hostname localhost --hmr-port 6789 --port 8080
scripts.bundle-electron: parcel build application/index-electron.html --out-file index --out-dir electron-bundle/ --public-url ./ --target browser --no-source-maps
scripts.bundle-android: parcel build application/index-android.html --out-file index --out-dir android-bundle/ --public-url ./ --target browser --no-source-maps
scripts.build-electron: npm run pack:linux32 && npm run pack:linux64 && npm run pack:win32 && npm run pack:win64 && npm run pack:osx
scripts.build-linux32: npm run build-clean && npm run bundle-electron && npm run pack-linux32
scripts.build-linux64: npm run build-clean && npm run bundle-electron && npm run pack-linux64
scripts.build-win32: npm run build-clean && npm run bundle-electron && npm run pack-win32
scripts.build-win64: npm run build-clean && npm run bundle-electron && npm run pack-win64
scripts.build-mac: npm run build-clean && npm run bundle-electron && npm run pack-mac
